price: ¦ayarsu ta ce, "Yã Bãba! Ka bã shi aikin ijãra, lalle ne mafi alhẽrin wanda ka bai wa aikin ijãra shi ne mai ƙarfi* amintacce."
arabic: قَالَتۡ إِحۡدَىٰهُمَا يَٰٓأَبَتِ ٱسۡتَـٔۡجِرۡهُۖ إِنَّ خَيۡرَ مَنِ ٱسۡتَـٔۡجَرۡتَ ٱلۡقَوِيُّ ٱلۡأَمِينُ
footnotes: * Watau tanã iShãra ga ubantada cewa Mũsa ya tãra siffõfin nan biyu na ƙarfi da amãna dõmin abin da ta jarraba daga gare shi kafin ya iso ga ubanta.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālat iḥ'dāhumā yāabati is'tajir'hu inna khayra mani is'tajarta al-qawiyu al-amīnu
